name: finsight
description: A full-stack personal finance tracking app designed to help users stay on top of their spending and budgeting â€” built with **React.js**, **Tailwind CSS**, **shadcn/ui**, **Prisma ORM**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Node js and Express js**.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix Backend && npm install --prefix Frontend && npm run prisma:generate --prefix Backend && npm run build --prefix Frontend && cp -r Frontend/dist Backend/dist
